lines: Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity.
author: 0x000055753b6a4f18

lines: The most basic and powerful way to connect to another person is to listen. Just listen.
author: 0x000055753b684880

lines: I’m a very strong believer in listening and learning from others.
author: 0x000055753b6ed358

lines: With the gift of listening comes the gift of healing.
author: 0x000055753b6d43a8

lines: Listening is where love begins: listening to ourselves and then to our neighbors.
author: 0x000055753b734848

lines: Touch the earth, speak of love, walk on common ground.
author: 0x000055753b71c630

lines: We all come from different paths in life but we can find common ground.
author: 0x000055753b6fcd30

lines: Music has a great power for bringing people together.
author: 0x000055753b75fae8

lines: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
author: 0x000055753b73f658

lines: We can find common ground only by moving to higher ground.
author: 0x000055753b79edb0

lines: No legacy is so rich as honesty.
author: 0x000055753b786e68

lines: Don’t ever regret being honest. Period.
author: 0x000055753b7e4e28

lines: When you walk a life of honesty, you live a life of truth.
author: 0x000055753b7c5438

lines: Honesty is the fastest way to prevent a mistake from turning into a failure.
author: 0x000055753b82d1c8

lines: Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
author: 0x000055753b80f010

lines: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
author: 0x000055753b7f4508

lines: The only person who can really motivate you is you.
author: 0x000055753b85eb10

lines: It always seems impossible until its done.
author: 0x000055753b834388

lines: Great things come from hard work and perseverance. No excuses.
author: 0x000055753b8ad4e0

lines: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: 0x000055753b887e70

lines: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning to sail my ship.
author: 0x000055753b8f5ba0

lines: An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
author: 0x000055753b8dcad8

lines: A love of learning has a lot to do with learning that we are loved.
author: 0x000055753b94cfb8

lines: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
author: 0x000055753b9275d8

lines: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
author: 0x000055753b907ad0

lines: Believe in yourself and go for it.
author: 0x000055753b985b60

lines: I don’t like to gamble, but if there’s one thing I’m willing to bet on, it’s myself.
author: 0x000055753b95e3a8

lines: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
author: 0x000055753b9deaa8

lines: It is our privilege and our adventure to discover our own special light.
author: 0x000055753b9af2f8

lines: Always be yourself and have faith in yourself.
author: 0x000055753ba37db0

lines: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
author: 0x000055753ba0eaa0

lines: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
author: 0x000055753ba8d5d0

lines: If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it. It's the hard that makes it great.
author: 0x000055753ba6eef0
